import React, { Component } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; export default class UploadDocuments extends Component { state = { titleField : { title : "" ,}, documentField : { document: ""}, formFields: { } }; upload = async (event) => { const target = event.target; const name = target.name; const value= target.value; var fileInput = event.target.files[0]; var data = new FormData(); data.append('title', name); data.append('document', fileInput, value); await axios({ url: "http://commerchant.herokuapp.com/documents/upload/", method: "POST", headers: { // Authorization: window.localStorage.getItem("token"), Authorization:"Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..RQgtpcBfTpJ59UlNUla_sGe7gJpsuFn4mb8snSoZyk0" }, body: data, redirect: 'follow' }) .then((response) => console.log(response.success)) .catch(() => console.log("Upload Başarısız")); }; render() { return (
